settings.title: Shipping information
settings.content:
Free USPS shipping - no minimum required

All Boho-Magic orders are shipped through the USPS from Temecula, CA, Unites States.
Handling time: 24 hours after the payment is cleared. (except special orders).
Shipping time: First class shipment: 2-8 business days (for US shipments).

Customs & Duties

The total amount you pay includes all applicable customs duties & taxes. We guarantee no additional charges on delivery.

Gift wrap

Free service of gift wrapping with every order.
If you are purchasing a beautiful jewelry for a loved one, just send us a message on payment and we'll gift wrap it for you.
Anyone would be happy to receive jewelry as a gift, especially when it's so nicely wrapped.

settings.code:
Authentic Moonstone
×
At Boho-Magic, the authenticity, quality and sustainability of our gems is a top priority
  • We use genuine gemstones that have been ethically harvested in India
  • We do small restocks frequently to ensure our products are sustainable and do not demand overharvesting from the earth
  • All our gemstones have been lab tested and issued a GIA authenticity certificate (Gemological Institute of America)
  • We choose to work with gems that have a rating of 5 or higher on the Mohs Scale of Hardness to ensure their durability.
  • Each gem is one of a kind and will vary slightly from the examples pictured
  • All our jewelry is made with sterling silver that has a .925 stamp verifying its authenticity
  • Each jewelry piece comes in a protective gift box with a polishing cloth

settings.testimonial: I’ve never left a review for anything in my life but I felt the need to for this beautiful ring! It’s even more amazing in person, I’m absolutely in love. You can tell it’s high quality, it shipped super fast, I’ve already gotten so many compliments on it. If I could give this ring and this business more than five stars I would ☺️
settings.author: Tess

settings.testimonial: Beautiful ring and quick shipping! Will definitely be purchasing more pieces.
settings.author: Rachel

settings.testimonial: Was Christmas shopping for other people and had to buy this beauty for myself ☺️super fast shipping and beautiful ring. Definitely will be ordering from this shop again.
settings.author: Kristine

settings.testimonial: I love both rings!!! They are so beautiful that I went and ordered another one ☺️
settings.author: Todd

settings.testimonial: Absolutely love this ring! Great ring for a middle finger- big, but not bulky. Great quality, fast shipping. Will buy from this shop again!
settings.author: Sam

settings.testimonial:
Totally in love!
beautiful piece, the stone shines very subtle but it's still amazing!
important is to take it 2 sizes bigger than normal because of its width!
wear it every day!
thanks!
settings.author: Linda

settings.testimonial: I am so happy with this ring! It is beautiful and so unique! I have never found anything like it! Highly recommend, it also got here in good time.
settings.author: Mckenzie

settings.testimonial: Got exactly what was ordered, came quickly and the quality is quite nice! Will be purchasing more from this shop. In fact I've already purchased 3 more rings from here! Great prices for great quality!
settings.author: Heather

settings.code:
<script type="text/javascript">
  var _learnq = _learnq || [];
  var item = {
    Name: {{ product.title|json }},
    ProductID: {{ product.id|json }},
    Categories: {{ product.collections|map:'title'|json }},
    ImageURL: "https:{{ product.featured_image.src|img_url:'grande' }}",
    URL: "{{ shop.secure_url }}{{ product.url }}",
    Brand: {{ product.vendor|json }},
    Price: {{ product.price|money|json }},
    CompareAtPrice: {{ product.compare_at_price_max|money|json }}
  };
  _learnq.push(['track', 'Viewed Product', item]);
  _learnq.push(['trackViewedItem', {
    Title: item.Name,
    ItemId: item.ProductID,
    Categories: item.Categories,
    ImageUrl: item.ImageURL,
    Url: item.URL,
    Metadata: {
      Brand: item.Brand,
      Price: item.Price,
      CompareAtPrice: item.CompareAtPrice
    }
  }]);
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
var _learnq = _learnq || [];
function addedToCart() {
  fetch(`${window.location.origin}/cart.js`)
  .then(res => res.clone().json().then(data => {
    var cart = {
      total_price: data.total_price/100,
      $value: data.total_price/100,
      total_discount: data.total_discount,
      original_total_price: data.original_total_price/100,
      items: data.items
    }
    if (item !== 'undefined') {
      cart = Object.assign(cart, item)
    }
    _learnq.push(['track', 'Added to Cart', cart])
  }))
} 
(function (ns, fetch) {
  ns.fetch = function() {
    const response = fetch.apply(this, arguments);
    response.then(res => {
      if (`${window.location.origin}/cart/add.js`
      	.includes(res.url)) {
        	addedToCart()
      }
    });
    return response
  }
}(window, window.fetch))
$(document).ajaxComplete(function(event, request, settings){
  if(settings.url == "/cart/add.js"){
      addedToCart()
  }
})</script>
